quote: You are not one person, but three: The one you think you are; The one others think you are; The one you really are. – Sathya Sai Baba
fact: The storage capacity of human brain exceeds 4 Terabytes.
joke:
Wife: Honey I’m pregnant.

Me: Well…. what do we do now?

Wife: Well, I guess we should go to a baby doctor.

Me: Hm.. I think I’d be a lot more comfortable going to an adult doctor.
